languages.text: "Благодарю тебя, Домин'{name}. Верь мне, когда я говорю, что это было важно. Для меня. Для нашей связи".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю тебя, Эним'{name}. Верь мне, когда я говорю, что это было важно. Для меня. Для нашей связи".

languages.text: "Thank you, Domin'{name}. Trust me when I say that it was important. For me. For our bond."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю тебя, Домин'{name}. Верь мне, когда я говорю, что это было важно. Для меня. Для нашей связи".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Enim'{name}. Trust me when I say that it was important. For me. For our connection."
"Thank you, Enim'{name}. Trust me when I say that it was important. For me. For our connection."
"Thank you, Enim'{name}. Trust me when I say that it was important. For me. For our bond."
"Thank you, Enim'{name}. Trust me when I say that it was important. For me. For our bond."
"Thank you, Domin'{name}. Trust me when I say that it was important. For me. For our bond."
"Thank you, Domin'{name}. Trust me when I say that it was important. For me. For our bond."

languages.text: «Gracias, Domin'{name}. Créame cuando le digo que era importante. Para mí. Para nuestro vínculo».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Domin'{name}. Trust me when I say that it was important. For me. For our bond."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, Domin'{name}. Créame cuando le digo que era importante. Para mí. Para nuestro vínculo».

languages.text: 「ありがとう、ドミン・{name}。これは本当に重要だったのに。私にとっても…私たちの絆にとっても」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Domin'{name}. Trust me when I say that it was important. For me. For our bond."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとう、ドミン・{name}。これは本当に重要だったのに。私にとっても…私たちの絆にとっても」

languages.text: “谢谢你，秘者{name}。相信我，这场仪式真的非常重要。这既是为了我，也是为了你我之间的纽带。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Domin'{name}. Trust me when I say that it was important. For me. For our bond."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，秘者{name}。相信我，这场仪式真的非常重要。这既是为了我，也是为了你我之间的纽带。”

languages.text: "Danke, Domin'{name}. Vertraut mir, wenn ich sage, dass das wichtig war. Für mich. Für unser Band."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Domin'{name}. Trust me when I say that it was important. For me. For our bond."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Domin'{name}. Vertraut mir, wenn ich sage, dass das wichtig war. Für mich. Für unser Band."

languages.text: « C'est moi qui vous remercie, Domin'{name}. Vous pouvez me croire quand je vous dis que c'était important. Pour moi. Et pour notre lien. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Domin'{name}. Trust me when I say that it was important. For me. For our bond."

traits.locale_text: « C'est moi qui vous remercie, Domin'{name}. Vous pouvez me croire quand je vous dis que c'était important. Pour moi. Et pour notre lien. »

languages.original_text: "Thank you, Domin'. Trust me when I say that it was important. For me. For our bond."

languages.text: "Teşekkür ederim Domin'{name}. Bunun önemli olduğu hususunda bana inan. Hem benim hem de aramızdaki bağ için önemli."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Domin'{name}. Trust me when I say that it was important. For me. For our bond."
